Uses of Package
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer

  • Packages that use org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master  
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master 
    Class and Description
    MasterAddressSyncer
    Tracks the active master address on server ZK cluster and synchronize them to client ZK cluster if changed
    MetaLocationSyncer
    Tracks the meta region locations on server ZK cluster and synchronize them to client ZK cluster if changed
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer used by org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.zksyncer 
    Class and Description
    ClientZKSyncer
    Tracks the target znode(s) on server ZK cluster and synchronize them to client ZK cluster if changed

    The target znode(s) is given through ClientZKSyncer.getPathsToWatch() method
    ClientZKSyncer.ZKData
    Used to store the newest data which we want to sync to client zk.
